text: @realDonaldTrump White supremacist mentally ill, its NOT because your action, but because of REAL leader intelligent WOMAN @SpeakerPelosi! She kept the fight for every American, while you care about THE rich only! Because of YOUR criminal negligent 122K Americans died from #covid19, still dying.
